definition: marked by up-to-dateness in dress and manners, any coniferous tree of the genus Picea, dress and groom with particular care, as for a special occasion
details:
adjective
- marked by up-to-dateness in dress and manners
= synonyms: jaunty
noun
- any coniferous tree of the genus Picea
- light soft moderately strong wood of spruce trees
verb
- dress and groom with particular care, as for a special occasion
= example: dress and groom with particular care, as for a special occasion
= synonyms: spruce up, slick up, smarten up
- make neat, smart, or trim
= synonyms: spruce up, slick up, smarten up, titivate, tittivate, spiff up
